channel.title: Spruce Blog
channel.description: Web developer and designer from Nigeria

item.title: Welcome to my personal blog and online journal
item.description:
Hey there welcome to my personal blog where i write about my learning process as a supposed web designer.

This site (My personal blog) Which was lunched on the 18th of November is my own personal online journal where i blog about everything web design.

This site is built with Jekyll and hosted on Github. And as u might have guessed this site was built and designed be Me (Spruce)

What i blog about

Ehn things i blog about are just a view minimal things:

  1. HTML
  2. CSS
  3. JAVASCRIPT
  4. JEKYLL
  5. and some DESIGN TIPS

Once again welcome aboard...

#hey { welcome: dear reader; }
